014package org.jdbi.v3.core.extension;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017
018import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
019
020/**
021 * Holder for a {@link Class} and a {@link Method} that together
022 * define which extension method was invoked.
023 */
024public final class ExtensionMethod {
025    private final Class<?> type;
026    private final Method method;
027
028    /**
029     * Creates a new extension method.
030     * @param type the type the method was invoked on
031     * @param method the method invoked
032     */
033    public ExtensionMethod(Class<?> type, Method method) {
034        this.type = requireNonNull(type);
035        this.method = requireNonNull(method);
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * Returns the type the method was invoked on.
040     *
041     * @return the type the method was invoked on.
042     */
043    public Class<?> getType() {
044        return type;
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * Returns the method invoked.
049     *
050     * @return the method invoked.
051     */
052    public Method getMethod() {
053        return method;
054    }
055}
